categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Dashar was a female Human Sith Lord who served the Sith Empire during the Cold War.
During the Cold War, she sold specialized gear for Sith Inquisitors in the Combat Training section of Vaiken Spacedock.

Dashar first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a level 50 Battlemaster PVP Gear vendor. She and all other Battlemaster gear vendors were removed from the game around Update 2.0 during an overhaul of the PvP gear system.
